Changes in version 0.3.3 (2025-09-19)

This package version requires R >= 4.4

Miscellaneous

  • Fix various anchors in the manual with broken target (CRAN request).

Internals

  • The vignette manual code takes very long to execute and must be pre-computed. To pre-compute the vignette: make changes in `B
